title: [Large-Scale] Exploring the Impact of Teacher Educational Materials: Case Studies on Online Platform Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories of teacher education and subject-matter knowledge in mathematics
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service teachers to develop competencies in designing and utilizing mathematics education materials. Activities primarily conducted through smartphone-based online platforms

learning_goals: Analyze and explain at least three characteristics of mathematics teaching materials suitable for different educational stages (pre-service, early-career, veteran teachers).
Apply teacher-created resources collected from online platforms to PBL projects and develop lesson design plans.
Present case-based analyses of how autonomous selection and modification of educational materials influence teachersâ€™ professional development and classroom confidence.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
